title: copy-static-assets Configuration
description: Defines which static assets should be copied from the src directory to the lib directory

includeExtensions.title: Include Extensions
includeExtensions.description: list of extensions to be copied

excludeExtensions.title: Exclude Extensions
excludeExtensions.description: list of extensions not to be copied. Takes prescedence over includeExtensions

includeFiles.title: Include Files
includeFiles.description: list of globs to be copied. Takes prescedence over extensions

excludeFiles.title: Exclude Files
excludeFiles.description: list of globs not to be copied. Takes precedence over includeFiles
